item.description:
I rarely ever miss a Stretch show and would enjoy some company.

Come on out and see the band STRETCH play a FREE SHOW at The Burren!
Located in Davis Square in Somerville, MA.

The Burren

The Burren has food available to those that might want to come early and get a bite to eat.
If there is enough interest we could meet before the show and get a bite to eat. There are some other good places to eat close by too.

Listen to STRETCH!

Stretch is typically a 5 piece Jazz band playing a unique Jazz/Funk/Fusion and even Reggae mix.
Dave Hess is playing woodwinds, Paul Erlick and Mike Herman's on Guitars.
George Chinaglia plays Bass and their Drummer Randy Wooten.
Stretch does not play very often so catch them when you can, you won't regret it.
Many people who have seen them insist they are better to hear and see Live than recorded.

Hope to Meetup with some of you there.
There is plenty of time to sign up and schedule to see this group.
I have set the limit to 20 people due to the size of the venue.
E-mail me if you have any questions...
item.how_to_find_us: The back room at the Burren is a relatively small place. I can provide my cell phone number on request to any meetup member who are planning to attend. I should have a meetup sign at my table near the center of the stage in the back room.
item.why: Please come see this Free Show and enjoy the Unique blend of varied music styles and talented musicians that make up the great Music of Stretch. You won't regret it!
item.name: Stretch (Jazz/Funk/Fusion) @ The Burren
